reviewText: A great introduction to the way in which the writing of The Star-spangled Banner came about.  It's perfect for younger children.

This is the best video that I have ever found to teach kids about the events surrounding the writing of our national anthem.  It is definitely kid friendly - very easy to follow and understand.  I bought it in the past and wore it out.  I was so happy to recently find it on Amazon, as it appears to be out of print.
